title: Looking for the Masters of the Universe Font
content:
Hello folks,

I'm specifically looking for the description font used on old Masters of the Universe packaging. I'm not looking for the logo type, only the type used for names etc.

Thanks in advance.

http://he-man.org/assets/images/collect\_toy/monstroid\_full.jpg

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174224im_/http:/typophile.com/files/01_5794.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174224im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bildschirmfoto%202013-09-18%20um%2011_4626.45.23.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174224im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bildschirmfoto%202013-09-18%20um%2011_5469.46.17.png)
author: Fux

comments.content:
[ITC Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226174224/http:/www.identifont.com/show?23B6) by Herb Lubalin and Antonio DiSpigna. Using the predigital alternates.

![]()
